name: Sugarcane Juice
history: Sugarcane Juice is a popular drink in many parts of the world, especially in regions where sugarcane is cultivated. It's been consumed for centuries, known for its natural sweetness and refreshing qualities.
description: Sugarcane Juice is a natural and refreshing drink extracted from sugarcane stalks. It's typically served chilled with a squeeze of lemon and a hint of ginger and mint, enhancing its flavor and making it a perfect beverage for hot days.

instructions.title: Extract the Juice
instructions.description: Run the peeled sugarcane stalks through a sugarcane juicer. Add a small piece of ginger and a few mint leaves to the juicer for added flavor.

instructions.title: Add Lemon Juice
instructions.description: Squeeze the juice of half a lemon into the extracted sugarcane juice. Stir well.

instructions.title: Serve Chilled
instructions.description: Pour the sugarcane juice over ice cubes in a glass. Serve immediately for maximum freshness and taste.

tips: Ensure the sugarcane is fresh and juicy for the best quality juice.
Adjust the amount of lemon, ginger, and mint according to your taste preferences.
variations: Add a pinch of black salt or chaat masala for a savory twist.
Blend with other fruits like pineapple or orange for a mixed juice version.

storage.shelfLife: Best consumed immediately. Sugarcane juice tends to oxidize and lose its flavor quickly.

presentationTips: Serve in a tall glass with a straw.
Garnish with a slice of lemon or a sprig of mint for an appealing presentation.
